attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
On the behalf of citezen of the UK, who have been Victims of con marriages, I Alan Mills have taken this opportunity in petitioning the Government that drastic Laws and Policies are in place to protect the rights of those who have contributed to enconomy and society.

Many more people like myself have been victims by the law and the immigration  who have not taken the time to listen to our complaints and alligations that have been submitted, some have loss their lives, expriencing post tarumatic stress, loss of Job and valuable assests, such as Houses, cars  and savings.

The following govenverning bodies should take percaution when dealing with indevidual cases.....(CSA, HM Tax , Legal Aid, Office, DSS, The Local Council etc )

Many our citezens have been denied their rights such as re-Housing, Financial benifits and support,
